home.Start your personal growth journey today: Start your personal growth journey today by creating your first quest or exploring what others are achieving
home.Discover popular quests that others are: Discover popular quests that others are taking on to improve themselves
home.Verify or Contest proofs of others and e: Verify or Contest proofs of others and earn Bitcoin rewards for your participation
home.Our platform makes it easy to challenge: Our platform makes it easy to challenge yourself and get community validation for your achievements
home.Define your quest with title, descriptio: Define your quest with title, description, tags and set a due date
home.Select public or private visibility. Cho: Select public or private visibility. Choose a coach or AI to assist your goal. Lock your Bitcoin as motivation
home.Work on your quest and collect relevant: Work on your quest and collect relevant metrics to track your progress
home.Upload your proof of completion - data,: Upload your proof of completion - data, images, or videos showing your achievement
home.Receive community validation and get you: Receive community validation and get your locked Bitcoin back (minus fees)
home.Get your locked Bitcoin back and receive: Get your locked Bitcoin back and receive donations from supporters when you complete your quest successfully
home.Help others achieve their goals and earn: Help others achieve their goals and earn Bitcoin
home.As a coach, you can guide, verify, and s: As a coach, you can guide, verify, and support others on their quests
home.Review quest submissions, provide constr: Review quest submissions, provide constructive feedback, and guide users towards their goals. Work one-on-one with users who choose private coaching.
home.Validate proof submissions and ensure us: Validate proof submissions and ensure users meet their quest requirements. Provide detailed feedback for private quests.
home.Get paid in Bitcoin by helping users ach: Get paid in Bitcoin by helping users achieve their goals. Schedule text, audio, or video coaching sessions and monetize your time.
home.No fees for quest creation, AI services,: No fees for quest creation, AI services, or private coaching
home.Access to special bettr.quest events and: Access to special bettr.quest events and contests
home.Get Out of Jail Free Card: Get Out of Jail Free Card
home.You can once get your funds back before: You can once get your funds back before due date and proof submission
home.Share a reference code and win 5% of the: Share a reference code and win 5% of their premium subscription
home.Show off your premium status with specia: Show off your premium status with special profile badges
home.Save on platform fees and unlock exclusi: Save on platform fees and unlock exclusive benefits with our premium membership

quest.Verifying legitimate proofs earns you {{: Verifying legitimate proofs earns you {{amount}} sats
quest.If multiple users verify, the reward is: If multiple users verify, the reward is split equally
quest.Successfully contesting a fraudulent pro: Successfully contesting a fraudulent proof earns you the entire locked amount {{amount}} sats
quest.Make sure you have evidence before conte: Make sure you have evidence before contesting! If multiple users contest, the amount will be split equally
quest.The quest creator has locked {{amount}}: The quest creator has locked {{amount}} sats to ensure accountability.
quest.If the proof is accepted, the acceptor w: If the proof is accepted, the acceptor will receive a reward from the locked amount. Multiple acceptors will split the reward equally.

summary.If your verification is correct: You'll: If your verification is correct: You'll receive {{amount}} sats
summary.If your verification is incorrect: You'l: If your verification is incorrect: You'll lose your locked amount ({{amount}} sats)
summary.If your contest is valid: You'll receive: If your contest is valid: You'll receive {{total}} sats (+{{quest}} sats from the quest)
summary.If your contest is invalid: You'll lose: If your contest is invalid: You'll lose your locked amount ({{amount}} sats)
summary.You'll get back {{amount}} sats upon suc: You'll get back {{amount}} sats upon successful completion

rewardInfo.If your verification is correct, you'll: If your verification is correct, you'll receive your locked amount + rewards set aside by the quest creator
rewardInfo.If your contest is valid, you'll receive: If your contest is valid, you'll receive your locked amount + the entire locked amount of the quest

rewardsSlider.Set aside a percentage of your locked am: Set aside a percentage of your locked amount as rewards for community members who verify your proof of completion. Higher rewards attract more verifiers and faster responses.

lockAmount.This amount will be locked until the pro: This amount will be locked until the proof verification is complete.
lockAmount.This amount will be locked in escrow unt: This amount will be locked in escrow until you complete your quest.

footer.Quest yourself to be better, one quest a: Quest yourself to be better, one quest at a time. Create, share, and complete personal quests with a community that supports your growth.
